result.reason: Enhancement to auto-save/restore panel layouts on exit/startup — 70% infrastructure exists (DockPanelLayoutLoader/Saver, ViewMenu, GetPersistString), needs lifecycle hooks and settings UI
result.approach: Hook DockPanelLayoutSaver.Save() into FrmMain.FormClosing for auto-save, add auto-restore of last layout in Startup.cs initialization, add settings toggle for auto-restore behavior on TabsPanelsPage, localize existing Save/Load Layout menu strings

attempts.raw_output:
Based on the analysis, the layout save/restore infrastructure is ~70% already built (DockPanelLayoutLoader/Saver, ViewMenu entries, ConnectionWindow.GetPersistString). The main gaps are auto-save on exit, auto-restore on startup, and settings UI.
